title: Visualizing the X-Intercepts
text: The x-intercept lies at the point of a function where the function touches the x-axis and y-value is zero.
speech: The x-intercept lies at the point of a function where the function touches the x-axis and y-value is zero.
pacedSpeech: The x-intercept lies at the point of a function where the function touches the x-axis and y-value is zero.

title: Visualizing the X-Intercepts
text: The graph of the function touches the x-axis at all points from $$0$$ to $$10$$ except for $$10$$, since there is a hole in the graph.
speech: The graph of the function touches the x-axis at all points from , 0  to  10  except for  10 , since there is a hole in the graph.

, since there is a hole in the graph.
